title: Manitou Dorado Pro Carbon DH fork ships soon, Hayes Dominion brakes go black
content:
Reinvented earlier this year, the new carbon-bodied Manitou Dorado Pro will start shipping late September in limited quantities, with more following in October. It’s an inverted design, as it’s always been, using 37mm stanchions on the bottom. MSRP is $1799 (this direct-mount stem not included), check out our full launch coverage for all the tech

The post Manitou Dorado Pro Carbon DH fork ships soon, Hayes Dominion brakes go black appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
